SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionMap<A>
Maps high-level enum actions to one or more Triggers.
AnchorPane
Container that positions children using Anchors.
Anchors
Anchor rules for children inside AnchorPane.
Animation
Time-based sprite animation.
AssetManager
Central asset cache/loader for the engine.
Button
Clickable button with hover/pressed/focus visuals.
Camera2D
Simple 2D camera for world-to-screen rendering.
Center
Container that centers a single child within its content area.
CheckBox
Clickable checkbox with label.
Collision
Lightweight collision helpers for AABB.
DockPane
Dock layout container: TOP, BOTTOM, LEFT, RIGHT, CENTER.
DockPane.Dock
 
Easing
Easing functions for tweens.
Easing.Ease
 
Engine<A>
Main engine entry-point that wires together the window, input, action mapping, scene system, camera, and assets, then runs the fixed-timestep loop.
EngineConfig
Mutable configuration object populated by the user's GameApp.configure(EngineConfig).
EngineContext<A>
Immutable container for engine-owned systems.
FadeTransition
Simple cross-fade: - renders FROM normally - renders TO with alpha = t
GameApp<A>
User application contract for the engine.
GridPanel
Grid layout container with optional row/column weighting and row/col spans.
GridPanel.Cell
Cell metadata for a node inside the grid.
InputManager
Central input collector for keyboard + mouse.
Insets
Immutable padding/margin-like values used by UI nodes.
KeyTrigger
Keyboard-based trigger.
Label
Non-interactive text label with optional autosizing and alignment.
Label.AlignH
 
Label.AlignV
 
Loop
Simple fixed-timestep game loop runner.
MouseButtonTrigger
Mouse-button-based trigger.
Panel
Simple rectangular panel that can draw a background fill and optional border.
ProgressBar
Non-interactive progress bar for a normalized value in [0..1].
Rectf
Axis-aligned rectangle.
Renderer2D
Thin wrapper around Graphics2D to reduce boilerplate and standardize drawing.
Resources
Helper for loading classpath resources (images, audio, fonts, etc.).
Scene
Core scene interface.
SceneManager
Stack-based scene controller.
SceneTransition
Strategy interface for transitions between two scenes.
Scheduler
Simple scheduler updated by Engine each tick.
Slider
Interactive slider for a normalized value in [0..1].
Sound
Thin wrapper around a Clip to provide simple sound playback control.
SpriteAtlas
SpriteAtlas maps string names to sub-rects of a single atlas image.
SpriteAtlas.Region
 
SpriteSheet
Utility for slicing sprites out of a sprite sheet.
StackPanel
Simple linear layout container (vertical or horizontal stacking).
StackPanel.Direction
 
TextField
Single-line text input field.
TimerHandle
Handle returned by Scheduler to allow cancellation.
TransitionScene
Scene wrapper that plays a SceneTransition between two scenes.
TransitionScene.Mode
 
Trigger
Abstraction for an input "trigger" that can drive an action.
TweenManager
Tween system for animating values over time.
TweenManager.FloatGetter
 
TweenManager.FloatSetter
 
UIContext
Per-frame UI context passed to UI nodes.
UINode
Base class for all UI elements in the engine.
UIRoot
Root of a UI tree.
UIRoot.Clickable
Optional interface for nodes that want simple click callbacks.
UIScene<A>
Scene implementation that owns a UI tree and renders it in screen space.
UITheme
Simple theme container for UI rendering.
Vec2
Minimal 2D vector (float-based for typical 2D games).
Window
AWT/Swing window wrapper that owns the JFrame, Canvas render surface, and a BufferStrategy.
WrapPanel
Flow layout container that places children left-to-right and wraps to new lines.
